page.title: 04SCHOOL LIFE IN PYPE HAYES
page.content: OUR PRIMARY SCHOOL WAS BUILT JUST OVER 50 YEARS AGO.THERE ARE 7 CLASSES WITH 1 TEACHER IN EACH,A HEADMASTER,A SECRETARY,AND 2 OTHER HELPERS.IN THE CLASSROOMS ARE GROUPS OR ROWS OF DESKS WHICH FACE THE BLACKBOARDS.THERE ARE ABOUT 30 CHILDREN IN EACH CLASS. CHILDREN WHO GO TO A NURSERY START AT 3 YEARS OLD,OTHERS START AT 4 IN THE INFANTS.AT 11 YEARS OLD WE ALL LEAVE THE JUNIORS AND GO TO SECONDARY SCHOOL UNTIL WE ARE 16 OR 18 WE GO TO SCHOOL EVERYDAY EXCEPT SATURDAY,SUNDAY AND HLIDAYS.THE DAY STARTS AT 8.55,DINNER IS FROM 12.00 TO 1.00 AND WE GO HOME AT 3.30.DURING THE DAY THERE ARE 2 PLAYTIMES. WE HAVE AN ASSEMBLY EVERY DAY,THEN MOSTLY ENGLISH OR MATHS BEFORE DINNER. IN THE AFTERNOON ARE LOTS OF DIFFERENT LESSONS.WE HAVE THE COMPUTER EVERY MONDAY MORNING AND SOMETIMES WATCH T.V.
